title: Charming Gold and Onyx Nazaria Bracelet with CZ Accent - 'Adhbutha Raksha'
materials: Black Onyx Beads (CZ Beads: 0.66 grams (12 beads))
Cubic Zirconia (D.wt: 0.21 grams (17 stones)). Crafted with meticulous attention to detail and a smooth Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Features a central floral-inspired medallion adorned with sparkling Cubic Zirconia, adding a touch of modern glamour. The delicate gold chain is interspersed with traditional black onyx beads, known for their protective properties. Three dainty gold dangles add movement and a playful element.
occasions: special occasions where a touch of subtle elegance is desired
as a modern take on traditional protective jewelry.
description: This 'Adhbutha Raksha' Nazaria bracelet offers a contemporary twist on a traditional concept. The combination of protective black onyx beads, sparkling CZs, and the purity of 22K gold creates a meaningful and stylish piece. It's lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear, making it a perfect gift for loved ones. Its unique design blends tradition with modern aesthetics.
